Our air conditioner was leaking onto the carpet - so I let the front desk know, they gave us towels to cover the area until maintenance could get it fixed the next morning.  We were out for the day when it was taken care of, and when we got back the problem was solved, carpet dry, and we had no further issues for the remainder of our stay.  People have complained about the breakfast - it is basic, but absolutely sufficient.  Waffles, donuts, toast, cereal, juice, coffee, water, etc.    They do not offer their own shuttle to Disneyland, but surrounding hotels do, or you can drive and park your vehicle there.  It's roughly 1.5 miles
Manager Response: Hi Samantha  Thank you for the nice review regarding your recent stay while visiting Anaheim.  A family trip to Disneyland can be an expensive venture.   Our goal is to offer clean, comfortable accommodations with a service-oriented staff at a reasonable rate.  I am so pleased that we met that goal for you.  We appreciate your business and look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Within Walking Distance to Disneyland/California Adventure
Summary: My family and I stayed here for four nights while we visited Disneyland/California Adventure. Upon our arrival, we found the check-in to be easy, and our room smelled nice. The room was clean and comfortable; it was not until towards the end of our visit that a couple of disappointing events took place. The first night we had dinner at the Cheesecake Factory, after dinner, we bought four slices of Cheesecake, and brought them back to the Motel. We put them in the fridge for later, a couple of days later, we went to eat our cheesecakes to find that the refrigerator was not turned on. We were not aware we had to turn the switch on, so we had to throw the desserts in the trash. The last night we stayed, some people got a room above us, and were making a lot of noise that went
Manager Response: Thank your for your stay and for the review.

Summary Heading: Good value at a good location.
Summary: The room was basic, and just like many others, I spent all day at disneyland/ California Adventure. All you need is a comfortable bed and clean room, which is what was provided. No need to have the most extravagant room as i knew i wouldn't be here all day. Staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Hi Eduardo  Thank you for the great review on your recent stay,  We are glad you found our hotel clean and comfortable for your stay.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: Thanks for welcome gifts ‚Äúflowers and snack‚Äù So convenient  -Near Disney land can be walking  -Have a lots restaurants nearby: hamburger, Italia ice cream, vietnamese res, Target store and rental car at opposite  - have pools and jacuzzi with heater -Have family room with connecting door  -Big size bed -Have laundry for guests  We are loving those of things, see you next time
Manager Response: Hi Judy T Thank you so much for your nice comments regarding our location, facilities and service.  We were happy to be your 'home away from home' and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We were in town for Business, checked in for a week then we wanted to extend our stay another week but because of high season and Disneyland they had all rooms reserved, but it wasn't their fault if you are coming around this time make your staying arrangements in advance,  Overall very clean place, friendly staff, and management. Great Location!
Manager Response: Hi Emokara  We appreciate your comments regarding your positive impressions of our facility as a result of your recent stay.  We look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: This hotel is located in best location near Disneyland and Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: Room is very spacious, clean, smells good, new carpet ,new comfy mattress.  50in Smart TV included in the room. Swimming pool is warm and clean. Will come back again for our next trip to visit California.
Manager Response: Hi Chopperdude  We appreciate your nice review on our location, guestrooms and pool.  WE appreciate your business and look forward to your return.

Summary: Horrible cancellation policy I booked a trip with these people in February and  canceled In  march when my date changed. There was a glitch in the system somewhere and I receive notification a day and a half before the trip that my hotel was still expecting me. I immediately canceled but was not able to get my full refund because this hotel requires 48 hours. It would‚Äôve been nice to have gotten the reminder email before the window expired. But as I mentioned above, I canceled in March. They refuse to work with my booking agency. Poor form.   Especially since most hotels in the area are completely booked and they will easily fill my vacancy.
Manager Response: Hello Kim L I am sorry for your disappointment with our cancellation charge.   Due to your booking on a 3rd party site, we were not informed of your cancellation.  We had turned away other guests requesting accommodations in order to hold a room for your expected arrival.  We do have a 1-night room + tax cancelation fee, which is stated on all websites offering rooms at our hotel. A guest room is a perishable commodity and cancellations within 48 hours are rarely replaced.

Summary: As soon as I got the hotel I was greeted by a very friendly Amal, who had really great customer service! It was an easy check-in and we got to the room to find a great sized fridge, microwave, and a tv with two reeeeally soft beds! We stayed for a total of two nights so we knocked out the first night but the second day we got to experience the hot tub which was very spacious! The pool was nice too, but I like being warm. It was a great walking distance from the convention center and right next to a lot of food! A lot of live entertainment as well with the tenants above! Lol! Definitely would stay again.
Manager Response: Hi Thank you so much for your nice comments.  We are especially proud of the work and service that Amal provides to our guests, as is provided by all of the staff.  We are pleased that you enjoyed the room size and amenities, as well as our outdoor hot tub. We look forward to your return.

Summary: It is not that close to Disneyland and they no longer offer a shuttle.  My sink did not work.  They held $1200.00 additional from my account for 4 days and did not tell me and would not admit it even though I verified the hold with my bank.  We had bugs in the rooms.  The furnishings were dusty and had a weird smell (all of the facilities smelled bad, even the lobby and elevator). One of the keys only worked one time.  The front desk staff did not understand enough English (when I asked for connecting rooms, I was told I already had 2 rooms).  There was hardly any parking, which caused guests to park behind each other.  There was no restroom available for my son to use during check in.  The breakfast area was horrible.  There was not enough seating and a sign posted that said no
Manager Response: Steve We are sorry your stay did not meet your expectations.

Summary: The rooms are clean, beds are comfortable, and the free breakfast was great! Traveling with a large group can be expensive and this hotel offers larger rooms/suites at an affordable price. Everyone is friendly and helpful, we will definitely stay here again next Disney trip.
Manager Response: Hi Samantha  Thank you for your kind comments regarding our facilities and services from your recent visit.  We appreciate your business and look forward to your return.  John N, GM

Summary Heading: Perfect for Business Travel & Family Getaways
Summary: My business brings me to Anaheim at least once a month for a few nights and I discovered this gem of a hotel mid last year when I tried booking a room during a major convention in town and thank goodness got the last room available in the house!  Since my first stay I found the staff to be incredibly accommodating and the rooms to be spacious, clean and easy to unwind in after a day in LA traffic.  Last month I was joined by my family for an extended min-vacation as we were all first time Disney adventurists.  With the park just a few minutes away from the hotel we were able to spend all day at the park, head back to the hotel for a little relaxation around the pool and went back for the evening activities.  The hotel‚Äôs amenities and services offer a perfect balance for my
Manager Response: Hello  Thank you for your very kind comments regarding our facilities and service.  It is always rewarding to receive reviews like yours and please be assured that this will be shared with our entire team. We appreciate your business and look forward to your return.

Summary: This is a great little hotel that is just the right price and just the right distance to the Happiest Place on Earth.  My wife and Daughter really enjoyed the free breakfast.  Although it was too cold the pool and hot tub looked like a spot we may be able to utilize on our next visit the summer.
Manager Response: Hi Jpals We appreciate your comments and look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Bug off, or be bitten by the Bugs at this Inn
Summary: Not all hotels are created or managed equal but sometimes there are few that will push the very bile to the tip of your throat and thats the best way you can describe the Carriage Inn.   Every January Anaheim hosts the cities largest convention called NAMM (National Association of Music Merchants) held at the Anaheim Convention Center. As a long time NAMM member and exhibitor, we tend to check out various hotels close to the Convention Center for convenience. This years VERY unfortunate choice was a small insect infested cesspool called the Carriage Inn (Yes I said Insect Infested).   Let me continue to say that everything I mention forward is the absolute truthful experience with no punches held back.   The Rooms themselves are incredibly old and outdated, rough condition and
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Disney Land Hotel on a Budget
Summary: Anahem Carriage Inn is located in a very conveniant clean safe area walking distance to Disney land. It has been newly renovated rooms very nice clean, comfortable bed breakfast is included. The downside is the parking specialy at night it is full they accomadate you in a adjacent lot belonging to someone else, the WiFi is slow and not very dependable. On the whole it is a very nice and comfortable place to stay on a budget. It is close to the Orange countyJohn Wayne Air Port
Manager Response: Hi Li Thank you for your nice comments on your recent stay.  When we are full parking can be a challenge.  We do have overflow spaces available next to the Hotel. We look forward to your return.

Summary: This is the type of hotel you stay at when you trust your inexperienced travel friends book a hotel for your group.   On our second night after returning from a long day at Disneyland we discovered a bed bug crawling up the headboard. Upon further inspection we pulled the sheets back and discovered a few more bugs.   We called the front desk to inform them of the situation and they rebutted with "we've never had this problem before". We asked kindly for a refund as we were going to leave. After getting no where on the phone we walked down to the lobby.  It was locked, of course. We work in customer service and we've been on the receiving end of customer complaints so we know how to keep it level headed.   The night auditor didn't treat us with compassion, or want to address the
Manager Response: Just to clarify some inaccuracies in the above narrative: -The desk clerk never called me, the General Manager, as I was out of town for the weekend. -The group came to the lobby at 1:30 am and became extremely unruly.  I have no knowledge if alcohol was involved.  As their situation escalated, the clerk called the police to restore calm to the group. -When I was informed 2 days ago, for the first time, that a refund was requested, we immediately issued a full credit.  As most people are aware, it takes 3-5 business days for the credit to be processed thru the banking system. We are certainly sorry this situation ever occurred.

Summary: We had a great experience at the Carriage Inn!  Clean rooms, good water pressure, friendly service, good continental breakfast.  The parking is kind of tight when everyone is there at night, but the front desk is willing to and helpful at finding a good place to park (for example there is some parking available behind the hotel).  For the breakfast I did suggest to the staff that they thaw the orange juice before putting it into the machine, which they said they would do.  The swimming pool was just right for my kids. Overall a really good experience.
Manager Response: Hello Richard Thank you for your comments and the 5-star review on your recent stay.  We look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed a week at this hotel for a combined sports tournament and vacation. The good, location. Walk to Disneyland, Joes Italian Ice and restaurants and Target. Clean room and very friendly staff. The bad, you have to pay for ice. At the rate charged and the heat this is not cool. The family suite with kitchen was a mini fridge and microwave. The parking, it is so compacted my rental was scratched and if you did t get there early enough in the evening you can‚Äôt get a space. The breakfast was barely continental, never space to sit and eat and not restocked often enough during the morning.
Manager Response: I am sorry that we did not meet your expectations.

Summary: If you're looking for safe and clean during a trip to Disneyland at a very reasonable rate, this is a great option. The staff was friendly and accommodating. It's often hard to find lodging for our family of 5, and the Carriage Inn made it happen for us. We used a roll away in our double queen room at a minimal additional charge. They offer a breakfast that could have been broadened for those with various dietary restrictions, but was it good enough. Quick tip, the CVS on the way to Disneyland is a great stop for picking up miscellaneous odds and ends, including some food. I found the Carriage Inn to be clean and I'm curious to see what they do with the remodel.
Manager Response: Hello Chris Thank you for your comments on your recent trip to the Anaheim area.  We do indeed cater to families at a very reasonable rate. We look forward to your return.

Summary: We stayed in a room with 3 king beds.  The room was large and fit all 5 of us easily.  The toilet and shower was in a different room from the sink so it made it very easy to get ready while someone was showering.  The hotel staff was very kind and helpful, we checked in 3 hours early.  There is not enough parking spaces for the amount of rooms they have.  When we arrived at 12am one night there was nowhere to park.  The front desk staff as able to help out even at midnight but I had to park in the middle of a driveway.   Very close to Disneyland.   Rooms need updated but if your spending all day at Disneyland it doesn‚Äôt matter.
Manager Response: Hi Derek Thank you for your comments.  As you are aware, we are in the process of upgrading the hotel rooms. I am glad you found the rooms and location convenient for your visit to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: You Get What You Pay For
Summary: This is a 2 star hotel. All the pictures online looked nice, but inside is a different story. The only thing clean about the room was the bed, thankfully. All the towels we were provided had a dirty brown/orange scabs on it.. the breakfast was discusting. With only doughnuts, cereal, and half frozen waffles I decided to go buy my own breakfast that wouldnt get me sick. There was a container of frozen waffles sitting out on the counter for you to put in a toaster. The milk was warm, sitting on the counter in a pitcher. The other guests were very loud and shady looking. Half of the people I saw in this hotel were fellow Disney goers and half where crackheads. Please save your money and spend $20 more somewhere else for a clean room.
Manager Response: Hello Kayla  We are sorry that the hotel did meet your expectations during your recent stay.  Your comments are quite contrary to the vast majority of 4 and 5-star ratings we receive from our guests on their experience at the Anaheim Carriage Inn.  We hope to be of service in the future.

Summary: One of the best hotel rooms I've stayed in. Very clean, comfortable and spacious. Staff was very friendly. We stayed 4 nights with 3 adults and 3 children had plenty of room and enjoyed our stay. We will definitely stay here again. Slept better than I do at home.
Manager Response: Hi David Thank you for your 5-star review.  We look forward to your return to our hotel.

Summary: The place, the rooms and the beds were ok. The breakfast was lousy. There were little spread and no cold cuts. It was not even any drinking water. We were here for 2 nights and the second morning some of us skipped the breakfast.   We were in disneyland one day, and we could walk from the hotel, which was good.
Manager Response: Hello Marthe  Please be advised that we offer a complimentary continental breakfast.  As such, there are no 'cold cuts' included in a continental breakfast.  I am glad you found the physical proximity to Disneyland a plus for your stay.

Summary: The staff was very nice, specially Farmina who helped us with an issue withe the shower, by giving us another room.  The location is great, same block as the Disney Parks, close to Outlets, restaurants, and pharmacies.  The rooms ar very comfortable and spacious.  We saw that they were painting which shows it is being renovated.
Manager Response: Hi Martha Thank you for your 5-star review on your recent stay..  We are indeed renovating and upgrading the Hotel.  Please come back to see us soon!

Summary: It was a memorable stay. The rooms were nice and cosy. Housekeeping was very good .Will give 5/5 for cleanliness. The staff overall were very good and helpfull. Special mention to Farmina at the reception. She was very friendly and helpful. She helped us plan our last day properly. Breakfast could have been better. It was good but we being vegetarians,  didn't have much options. Bread once over was not replenished. Overall it was a good experience. Will definitely recommend to my friends coming to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5-star rating on your recent visit to the Anaheim area.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: The staff was wonderful!  The rooms were very clean! We had a very late check in and the staff waited up for us to arrive. Beds were comfortable! Bathroom was Clean and fresh!  We will deffinatly stay again!
Manager Response: Hi Melissa  Thank you for your great review on your recent stay with us.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: Could not of been more happy with this little gem so close to Disneyland. I was a little worried booking online but all that dissolved when we arrived to a lovely receptionist booked us in for our 6 night stay. The room was very clean with 3 large beds that easily accommodated our family of 5. The beds were very comfortable and we even had 2 tv sets in the 2 rooms which the kids loved. Breakfast was great and the lady looking after that area was extremely nice and helpful. Nice clean pool and spa which was enjoyed after a long day sightseeing and a short walk to everything you need including Disneyland. Also plenty of parking available right outside your door.Unfortunately we had to leave a day early and did not get the nights accommodation back but that is totally acceptable
Manager Response: Hello Glenita Thank you for your 5-Star rating and the glowing review on your recent stay with us.  We so enjoy getting a review like this and I will share with all of our staff. Please come back and see us again!

Summary: My family and booked for 5 nights. It was dirty and their complimentary breakfast was horrible. They actually had soggy eggo waffles and small cheap doughnuts from the convienence store. Since everything else was all booked we had to stay. Also no housekeeping what so ever. Too expensive for a horrible, cheap, dirty hotel.
Manager Response: I reviewed your comments and must take exception to what you stated. We serve a complimentary light continental breakfast.  We offer dry cereal, Eggo waffles, hard boiled eggs, donuts and danish, assorted juices as well as coffee and tea.  I also do not understand your comment of no housekeeping.  We provide daily housekeeping service.  I am sorry we did not meet your expectations.

Summary Heading: Better Service Than Expected At Last Minute..
Summary: I actually got a room last month in March, so I'm a bit late with threview..!! But I had reservations at a neighboring hotel across the way from The Carriage Inn. Thye did not have my room ready,waited for atleast three to four hours and nothing.So I saw the Carriage Inn across the way. Walked in and was greeted by a pretty receptionist.Whom was handeling a customer..! I asked fr a room and she called the manager. He came out and they both found me one right there on the spot,took them no time..!! And it even turned out to be a few bucks cheaper than my prior hotels reservation..!! And the room was super clean quiet and comfortable..They had their own coffee pots in them with coffee,Flat screen t.v.'s and AC. what more could a traveling man ask for.I slept like a baby>>!! Thanks
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your 5-star review of your recent stay at our hotel.  We are pleased that your expectations were met and look forward to your retutn.

Summary: I had a great stay with my family last week. Front desk was very helpful and kind. Breakfast was great too. It has been renovated and updated recently. Overall a great experience, recommend this place highly.
Manager Response: Hi Alif  Thaks for your 5-star review of our hotel following your recent visit.  Please consider staying with us if your future travels bring you back to the Anaheim area.

Summary: I stayed in this hotel for 3 nights. This hotel is close to Disneyland but I wouldn't walk. It took about 10 minutes to get over there by car, but because I just needed a room with 3 queen beds so no one had to share, within a certain price point, this fit the bill nicely. The room was clean enough and the staff that I encountered was all friendly. The room was average - definitely not the worst I've ever stayed at, but not a 5 star hotel by any means. The only two issues I had were that the wi-fi was pretty horrible and not really usable, but a small detail that can be overlooked. The second was that the water in the shower would fluctuate from some pretty extreme temperatures without being touched. I had to jump out twice within a matter of 10 minutes because it scalded me
Manager Response: Hello April Thank you for your comments on your recent stay at our hotel.  We do indeed feel we offer a good product for a fair value.  We have installed additional access points on floor 3 and have technicians coming out tomorrow to explain why you had an issue with connectivity on the internet.  We have also replaced a part for the shower mechanism to correct the water temperature variation you experienced. We certainly hope you will consider staying with us again if your future travels bring you to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed 3 nights at this hotel. Staff were so lovely and helpful. Room was clean and heater kept us warm. Walking distance to Disneyland. Very affordable. I even left a pair of expensive earings in the bathroom and they are mailing them back to Australia for me. Very impressed
Manager Response: Hi Janine  Thank you for your 5-star review.  We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We were happy to send your earrings to you as Iwe know there was sentimental value.  We hope you will consider staying with us if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We have stayed here twice now. We have two or more families each time and Carriage Inn is good for that. It is an older property but has been maintained good. It is kept clean and is great for the price! Easy walk to Disneyland and lots of eating options near by.
Manager Response: Dear Sherww  Thank you for your positive review regarding your recent stay at the hotel.  Starting February 26, we will be replacing carpet in all guest rooms as well as installing a new bedding package.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: They should just close this hotel down and start over,  checked out today and my goodness it was a pain staying there. I should've listened to the bad reviews from before but no guess I had to find out the hard way how bad it is here,  they had ants in our room the whole time we were there,  not to mention the spiders in the shower,  or the dirty bath mat, the shower head was way too hard to maneuver there was a used band aid at the head of one of the beds, and the floors were disgusting, they were sticky and left our feet black just plain disgusting. Also the housekeeping tried to open our room door even though we were in it, even the manager did a quick knock then used his card to open the door,  if it weren't for the metal door lock they would've easily made their way into
Manager Response: Dear Tagiilima I am sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations during your recent stay.  I was informed that you reported ants in your room and I did visit your room with our pest control tech.  I knocked twice and, hearing no response, did indeed try to open the door.  Your husband did open the door and we asked if we could enter to investigate the report of ants.  He welcomed us in to do this.  We spent approx. 4 minutes in the room searching the vanity and bathroom area but could not find any sign of ants.   No mention was made to us or the front desk about spiders, a dirty bath mat, a shower head 'hard to maneuver', a band-aid, or dirty floors.  We shampooed your room carpet just 2 weeks prior to your arrival. I did notice half of the vanity full of fresh fruit and an assortment of food brought in to the room.  It is natural that when food is left out it will attract unwanted pests. Again, I am sorry we could not meet your expectations.  In light of your comments, possibly this may not be the hotel of choice for your future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary: I read the reviews of the Anaheim Carriage Inn before going there, but I ended up staying there anyway.  The rooms are very worn out and there are ants!!   The ants are all over the dresser, night stand and sink area.  Even if you are on a budget, it do not stay here.  The hotel is close to Disneyland, but we ended up having my husband drive us too and from the park since it is about a mile walk either way and it is a little far for my 5 year old, especially after a day at the park.  The breakfast is very minimal and we ended up going to Carl's Junior to supplement our breakfast.   The hot tub was nice, but I would not call it a hot tub, more like a warm bath.  I would not stay here again, and recommend staying somewhere else!
Manager Response: Dear Salukisu  I am sorry that your experience with our Hotel did not live up to your expectations.  We are in the process of renovating the Hotel with new carpet, bedding package, window treatments as well as furniture.  We also have discussed your issue of ants with our pest control company, which did treat your room and completes a monthly service of our guest rooms.  We certainly hope you will give us aniother opportunity to be of service in the future.

Summary: I had booked this hotel in February 2017 for a January 2018 stay for friends coming from India to attend the NAMM Convention in Anaheim. Unfortunately they needed to push back their stay by 1 day - exact same 4 nights, but checking in 1-day later, and checking out 1-day later. I had originally booked it on Expedia, so I first contacted Expedia. They told me they needed to check with the hotel to see if there was availability and what the price would be.  24 hours later I got email from Expedia saying this: "We contacted the hotel for approval to modify the dates directly at the hotel and we received an email that the hotel updated the dates on the booking. The hotel was able to modify the dates on January 25-29,2018 without any additional cost and honored the same rate." That
Manager Response: Dear Guest  I am certainly sorry that you had difficulty with the reservation process thru Expedia.  The reservation was made on the dates requested.  However, upon reviewing the reservations for the sold-out dates, we discovered your credit card used to reserve the room expired in 2017.  We did contact Expedia with this information and were instructed to cancel the reservation.  Regards,

Summary Heading: This ones about a 50/50 for me
Summary: We booked the Carriage Inn because we were able to get a room with three queen beds and we had four people in our party. The price was right for that size room and we were only in town for two days but the negatives definitely out weigh the positives at this motel. As with many if not most of the hotels/motels located in the Disneyland resort area, they get to take advantage of the fact that there will be masses of people needing rooms nearly every single day of the year. This means that they can skimp because someone will always book the room in spite of the negatives. I'm personally torn on this property because it scores well enough in my personal opinion for me to book it again but only if I have a large party that needs a place to crash. If you're looking for amenities or
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very old and run down but good value for a large family or a group
Summary: The Hotel is very old and run down, It is a very good option for a big family on a budget or a youth group traveling together. If you only need a place to "crash" but you will be out all day visiting Disney or California Adventure, this is the place. The place has very few good rooms but most of them are old and run down, rooms 317 and 318 need some serious best control and the air cons in there are very loud. They offer very basic breakfast; "Boiled eggs", 3 types of cereal, coffee, toast, jam and butter. the walk to Disney is long particularly after a long day. take a Taxi, it is $8 only, the Hotel will charge $5 per person for the shuttle bus. all rooms have a fridge, some actually do work. A microwave and a coffee machine. Don't be disappointed if your room key stops
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here and were unsure what to expect after seeing bad reviews! Honestly, the accomadation was comfortable! Its a bit of an older hotel, but was clean and had everything we needed! Plus it was an easy walk to Disney!  We found this place to be in a great location!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was the first hotel on our 3 week west coast tour, I found the check in was very easy with just $50 deposit to pay for the room. The location for Disney is perfect! so much so you can see the fire works from your room. The hotel is noting posh but it is clean, tidy and very convenient. I would recommend this if you are not wanting to stay on park. plus there is a Wallmart down the road and many places to eat.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent value for money.  We had low expectations for the price of this hotel - we had two families in adjoining rooms and an excellent experience.  The staff were friendly and helpful when we had enquiries, the breakfast room was simple,functional and clean. The shower pressure was great, and the location quiet.  Walking distance to the free Disney shuttle and close to good restaurants (particularly Clancy's up the road).  The air con was a bit noisy and stale, but functional. Would recommend if you are looking for a cheap base close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: When I first arrived the room smelled. I was her for business and everything was booked by the convention center so I bought a blanket and Lysol spray cause the room felt so dirty. I stay 5 days total. On the 4th day my boyfriend came down cause I didn't have to do my business classes at the convention center and my boyfriend saw the cockroach. He does pest control and then he looked around the room and found more. This hotel is invested. Just pay the extra $$ and stay at a better hotel. Before we can unpack we have to go through all our luggage. This hotel ruined our trip.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I booked this non refundable on booking and was nervous at the mixed feedback as time went on.  I am sorry not everyone had the experience we did.  For a budget hotel everything was fine except the WiFi signal did not work on the 3Rd floor.  After the first day we were glad we said something because we got a free upgrade room  to the ground floor.  Also got some recommendations of where to go to find a phone charger cord we forgot at home so very pleased with front desk.  For the record there are wifi restaurants around and you can use the ART bus near the hotel as a bit if walk to convention and Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review regarding your recent stay at our hotel in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Good for those looking for a cheaper option for Disney
Summary: The motel was in a good location- there were restaurants nearby and the walk to Disney was about 20-30 minutes.  The room was spacious and the bathroom was a decent size. We had a TV and fridge, and there were hangers for clothes and an iron too.  The reception staff were friendly and helpful. We had no issues checking in and out.  A downside is that it was slightly noisy in the early morning and at night, but not so much that I couldn't sleep.  If you are looking for somewhere clean and safe to sleep whilst you explore Disney, then this is a good choice of motel. If you are wanting luxury, then perhaps go elsewhere.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice hotel and convenient to theme parks
Summary: This was our first time staying at the hotel and would definitely stay again. Nothing fancy here but the rooms were neat, clean and comfortable. The complimentary breakfast was cereal, toast, juice and pancakes and if you got there early enough muffins and donuts. We didn't interact with the staff very much but the check-in/check-out went smoothly and the staff we did see were friendly. Rooms were clean and the beds were fine. Only negative was that the TV cable package did not have Disney Channel which my kids enjoy. It took us about 20-25 minutes to walk to the Disneyland front gate each morning and then at night we rode the free shuttle to the Buzz/Woody parking lot and then it was a 5 minute walk from there.
